name: Mukhammad Fadhila Ikhsani
intro: A passionate backend developer with a strong background in web development, database management, and system architecture. I enjoy building scalable and efficient solutions using NestJS, Express, Laravel, React, and MongoDB.
With a degree in Computer Engineering from Universitas Brawijaya, I am always eager to learn new technologies and take on challenging projects. Let's connect and create something amazing!
about: a Computer Engineering graduate from the Faculty of Computer Science, Universitas Brawijaya. I have a strong passion for software development, particularly in backend development, database management, and web-based applications.

I have hands-on experience in various projects, including building a digital signature system and developing a company profile website with a Contact Us feature. I am proficient in modern technologies such as TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, C++, React, NestJS, Express, Laravel, Prisma, and MongoDB.
I am always eager to learn new technologies and tackle complex challenges. With my skills, I am ready to contribute to developing innovative and high-quality digital products.
